name: Godyssey: Enlighten
description:
Warriors, Gods are calling
The world has been enshrouded in darkness for ages. You are chosen by ancient gods and goddesses, to be the warrior to fight along with them to bring light back to the world. In the path of seeking light, you will encounter tons of different dungeon bosses, start the glorious journey now!

Conquer 3D Dungeons-Expel the Darkness
The endless dungeon is full of dangerous and opportunities. Go start your journey! But be careful, the monsters are staring you in the darkness and keep looking for any weak points.

100+ Legendary Gods-Summon Your Deities
Each immortal from ancient myth, has powerful and unique magic. Assemble your team of gods, group their strengths to fight against evil force.

Auto Battle-Worry Free
No time to tap? Don't worry! With auto fight system, you can easy start adventure at anytime and anywhere. Seize the crucial moment to unleash special attack, clear the BOSS effortlessly!

Grow Your Warrior-As You Like
Wizard, archer or swordsman, change weapon and fight method whenever you want! The game contains wide variety of equipment that allows you to build the hero in your own style.

AFK Rewards-Keep Getting Stronger
Warrior won’t stop fighting even when you are away. Every time you login, you can receive diamonds and gold coins,as well as scarce cards and advanced equipment!
